Force-sensitive wielders my add :advantage:1279760566587490314:advantage:1279760566587490314 to Perception or Vigilance checks to detect a hidden being within short range.

Crystal ceases to function if wielder's Morality is reduced below 50.

BaseMods.MiscDesc: When rolling for initiative, or attacking with its Insatiable Maw, a space slug rolls a [B]Coordination skill check[b], counting as having Coordination 3 and Agility 1 (:proficiency:1279760961695256718:ability:1279760565388181598:ability:1279760565388181598).

A starship of silhouette 5 or lower attacked by a space slug, regardless of whether or not the attack hit, must make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Piloting (Space) check[b] to avoid being swallowed. If swallowed, ship suffers 10 hull trauma daily from being digested.
The stomach of an space slug is also generally home to mynocks, which will waste no time attacking a swallowed starship.
Explosive's detonator is controlled by a droid brain that can activate under any predetermined circumstance.
Upgrade ability on Ranged combat checks made with this weapon once.

Suffer 3 strain to remove :despair:1279760580332355607 from Ranged combat check

Skill checks to operate device uses either Computers or Piloting (Planetary).

If :threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960 or :despair:1279760580332355607 is rolled, shields burn out and stop working until repaired.

May be employed as a weapon.

Broadcasts all incoming and outgoing signals from a comlink to a remote listener at medium range.

Provides a ship or vehicle with a holographic disguise. A [B]Daunting (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Perception check[b] is required to see through the disguise at a distance. Physical examination immediately detects the disguise.

AddedMods.MiscDesc: Add one additional disguise to the database

BaseMods.MiscDesc: Adds [SE][SE] to all checks to detect this ship audibly while it is in atmosphere.

Characters attempting such an alteration must make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Mechanics check[b]. This adds [SE] to Perception checks that operators using a scanning device make to detect the item. They may spend :triumph-1:1279760921266360471 from the Mechanics check to have the difficulty of such detection checks upgraded once.

Each net :success:1279760614994087987 from the check for reducing a weapon's energy output also reduces its damage by one, to a minimum of 1. Characters may spend :triumph-1:1279760921266360471 from the Mechanics check to halve this reduction in damage, rounding up.

Only weapons that use energy-based attacks or other advanced devices can have their energy output reduced or signature concealed. This means that slugthrowers and traditional explosive devices cannot be modified in this fashion. In addition, items that require extensive power (such as repeating blasters) cannot have their energy signature reduced.
[B]Price:[b] 5% of armor's price.

To make this change, he must spend a number of hours equal to the armor's encumbrance and make a [B]Hard (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Mechanics check[b]. Each :success:1279760614994087987 or :triumph-1:1279760921266360471 provides one encumbrance point's worth of hidden space in the armor. The armor cannot gain more encumbrance points for hiding objects than the suit's own encumbrance value, and items concealed in this way do not count towards the user's encumbrance threshold. Add [SE][SE] to all Perception checks made to notice items hidden in this manner.
No matter how many :success:1279760614994087987 are rolled, though, a suit of armor cannot conceal any single item with an encumbrance value greater than 2.

Each point of encumbrance value for concealed space gained in this fashion reduces the armor's hard points by one, to a minimum of 0. Any armor with no hard points, such as padded armor or heavy clothing, can still have enough concealed space for an item with an encumbrance value of 1.

For every two encumbrance points' worth of concealed space created, an armor's soak is reduced by one. However, each net :advantage:1279760566587490314 on the initial Mechanics check to modify the armor cancels out one point of soak reduction.

Unless ignited, lightsaber is indistinguishable from ordinary walking stick. Must pass [B]Formidable (:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210:difficulty:1279760984621191210) Perception[b] or [B]Vigilance check[b] to notice.
May spend maneuver to increase Force rating by 1. Persists until extra [FO] is used to fuel a Force power.

GM may spend :threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960 or :despair:1279760580332355607 to cause lightsaber to sputter and fail. Lightsaber cannot be reignited for one hour.

Activating or deactivating the fusion shunt requires a maneuver. If the Iightsaber is used as a weapon while the shunt is active, all combat checks suffer :threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960, but the weapon's Breach quality increases by 1. While the fusion shunt is active, the llghtsaber can slice through obstacles with ease, destroying or cutting through barriers and other inanimate targets at twice the normal rate. Exact details are up to GM's discretion, but in general, hardened security doors and reinforced walls should withstand two to three rounds of cutting, with other obstacles being dealt with in a corresponding time frame

When the wearer heals strain at the end of an encounter, they also heal 1 wound. If they suffered any wounds during the encounter In addition, the first time in an encounter that the character's current wounds exceed half their wound threshold, the armor automatically applies a stimpack to the character.

When this weapon's Sunder quality is activated by spending one or more :advantage:1279760566587490314, the damage suffered by the targeted item automatically increases by one step. GM may spend :threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960:threat:1279760886906490960 or :despair:1279760580332355607 to cause the crystal's resonance to temporarily interrupt the power flow, disabling the weapon until the end of the wielder's next turn.

Can quickly cut through most materials. Once modified this way, the lightsaber no longer functions normally. Instead, when the lightsaber is activated, it begins to overload. At the end of the following round, the lightsaber detonates, dealing 20 damage with the Breach 1 and Vicious 4 item qualities to all characters and objects within short range. The lightsaber, but not its kyber crystal, is destroyed in the process.

[H3]Modular Cargo Holds[h3]Each Temple-class has three Modular cargo holds in any combination of the types detailed below. This list is far from exhaustive. GMs with specific ideas concerning the construction. purpose, and/or layout of the freighter's specific holds should feel free to modify them however they wish.[H4]Bulk Cargo Hold[h4] The standard cargo hold utilized by the Temple-class heavy freighter is known as the bulk cargo hold. Generally speaking, bulk cargo holds are unusual by most estimations, and are capable of storing and transporting nearly any kind of cargo. Though not specifically conditioned for extreme environmental controls. the temperatures and humidity within these massive holds can be adjusted within certain baseline parameters. therefore allowing for a perpetually steady (if somewhat mundane) internal climate.[H4]Detention block/Prison Containment[h4]Detention block/prison containment holds are designed to confine prisoners and other unwilling passengers. Internally, they resemble Imperial detention facilities. and they are staffed by additional security crew depending on the number of prisoners being housed within them. Prisoners in detention blocks are kept under one of three circumstances: solitary confinement. shared confinement, or general confinement. [P]Prisoners in solitary confinement are kept alone in small cells with little more than a bed and a refresher as amenities. Interrogations are carried out within these cells, and the walls are soundproofed. So long as the cell's blast door is sealed, the prisoner's screams are not audible to his neighboring captives. [P]Shared confinement spaces include cells that house between two and four prisoners apiece. Like solitary confinement cells, they have limited amenities and no privacy. A single refresher serves all occupants. and slabs for sleeping and sitting extend from the room's walls. Prisoners kept in shared confinement are typically taken to a separate interrogation room should they need to be questioned or tortured. [P]General confinement houses up to fifty prisoners together in close quarters. The conditions are squalid. with as few as one or two refreshers shared by all prisoners. If necessary, the Empire has been known to place two or three times as many prisoners into general containment as can be comfortably accommodated. In such conditions. diseases spread quickly, and prisoner life expectancy is generally short and uncomfortable. [P]Each detention block hold provides cramped accommodations for up to fifty additional security personnel, though this number varies depending on how many prisoners are kept aboard. [H4]Environmentally Conditioned Hold[h4]From scorching temperatures to sub-freezing climates. environmentally-conditioned cargo holds can maintain any form of internal climate. Whether used to transport finicky cargo (such as chemicals or other elements) that can only be preserved at such temperatures. or an alien species with special environmental requirements. these cargo bays are relatively rare but useful nonetheless. Crew or other individuals wishing to move about environmentally conditioned holds must wear appropriate gear. such as hazmat suits. breath masks. environmental clothing. or space suits. Both internal and external airlocks help to maintain different atmospheres between the ship's crew and the cargo hold itself.[H4]Hazardous Materials Containment[h4]Similar in design to an environmentally conditioned hold, hazardous material containment holds are slightly different in that their cargo is volatile in some way. From explosives to fue l to radioactive materials, hazardous materials holds are able to transport such dangerous cargoes with relative ease and safety. Shielding comes standard with such holds. preventing unwanted emissions from harming nearby ships or orbital environments[H4]Passenger Compartments[h4]Unlike detention/prisoner containment holds, Temp/ecompatible passenger compartments are practically luxurious. They are designed to accommodate far fewer passengers than their detention counterparts do. and they are far more comfortable and accommodating. Security is generally less of a concern in passenger compartments. as they are not designed to keep their occupants confined for any length of time. [P]In addition to conveying VIPs, high -value prisoners are also kept in passenger compartments. though they are traditionally assigned a security detail.

AddedMods.MiscDesc: Bulk Cargo Hold
